summary.span: 定义由所有 ASP.NET 服务器控件共享的属性、方法和事件。

span.span: Defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by all ASP.NET server controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 这是开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件时派生自的主类。This is the primary class that you derive from when you develop custom ASP.NET server controls. 没有任何用户界面（UI）特定功能。 does not have any user interface (UI) specific features. 如果要创作的控件不具有 UI，或者合并了呈现其自己的 UI 的其他控件，请从 派生。If you are authoring a control that does not have a UI, or combines other controls that render their own UI, derive from . 如果要创作具有 UI 的控件，请从 或 命名空间中的任何控件派生，该命名空间为自定义控件提供相应的起始点。If you are authoring a control that does have a UI, derive from or any control in the namespace that provides an appropriate starting point for your custom control. 类是所有 ASP.NET 服务器控件（包括自定义控件、用户控件和页）的基类。The class is the base class for all ASP.NET server controls, including custom controls, user controls, and pages. ASP.NET 页是 类的实例，该类继承自 类，并处理对具有 .aspx 扩展名的文件的请求。ASP.NET pages are instances of the class, which inherits from the class, and that handle requests for files that have an .aspx extension. 类可以直接或间接地用作你的 Web 应用程序的用户界面的一部分，因此应进行仔细检查以确保编写安全代码和确保应用程序安全的最佳做法。The class can directly or indirectly be used as part of the user interface for your Web application, and as such should be scrutinized to make sure best practices for writing secure code and securing applications are followed. 有关这些主题的常规信息，请参阅[Web 应用程序安全威胁概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/f13d73y6(v=vs.140))、[安全策略最佳实践](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/sa4se9bc(v=vs.100))和[主要安全概念](/dotnet/standard/security/key-security-concepts)。For general information on these topics, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/f13d73y6(v=vs.140)), [Security Policy Best Practices](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/sa4se9bc(v=vs.100)), and [Key Security Concepts](/dotnet/standard/security/key-security-concepts). 有关更具体的信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))的安全、[如何：显示安全错误消息](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/994a1482(v=vs.100))、[如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用于字符串来保护 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，以及[验证控件简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85))。For more specific information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/994a1482(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Introduction to the Validation Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示从 类派生的自定义服务器控件。The following example demonstrates a custom server control that derives from the class. `InnerContent` 类将重写 方法，并检查该类是否在页面上有任何子控件，并确定控件的第一个子级是否为文本控件。The `InnerContent` class overrides the method, checks to see if the class has any child controls on the page and determines whether the first child of the control is a literal control. 如果同时满足这两个条件，则重写的方法会将 HTML 字符串 \

消息：、文本控件的内容和关闭 \

标记发送到 Web 窗体页。If both of these conditions are met, the overridden method writes the HTML string \

Your Message:, the contents of the literal control, and a closing \

tag to the Web Forms page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic Control Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Control Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非重写，否则此方法会自动将 对象添加到服务器控件的 对象中。Unless you override it, this method automatically adds objects to the server control's object. 可以通过 属性访问此集合。This collection is accessible through property. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个自定义服务器控件，该控件使用 方法来确定在此控件的开始标记和结束标记之间声明的元素是否 Web 服务器控件。The following example is a custom server control that uses the method to determine if elements declared between the opening and closing tags of this control are Web server controls. 如果是，则会将它们添加到 对象中，`items`。If they are, they are added to an object, `items`. 调用重写的 方法时，它将循环访问 并将其中的每个对象添加到自定义服务器控件的 。When the overridden method is called, it iterates through the and adds each object in it to the of the custom server control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). span.span: Applies the style properties defined in the page style sheet to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法根据主题目录中定义的外观属性来设置控件的样式属性。The method sets style properties on the control based on skin properties defined in a theme directory. 应用的外观是控件的默认外观或 属性中指定的外观。The skin applied is either the default skin for the control or the skin specified in the property. 方法由 ASP.NET 调用，用于放置在页面上的声明性控件。The method is called by ASP.NET for declarative controls placed on a page. 必须在运行时以编程方式在运行时对创建的任何控件调用 方法，才能将样式表的外观应用于控件。You must call the method on any controls created programmatically at run time for style sheet skins to apply to the control. 主题外观会自动应用。Theme skins are applied automatically. 有关主题和级联样式表之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information on the difference between themes and cascading style sheets, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

span.span: The style sheet is already applied.

span.span: Gathers information about the server control and delivers it to the property to be displayed when tracing is enabled for the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性收集页面的 UI 层次结构所需的信息，并将其传递给页面的[<trace>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/trace-element)属性。This property gathers the information necessary about a page's UI hierarchy and passes it to the page's [<trace>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/trace-element) property. 为页或应用程序启用跟踪时，此信息显示在跟踪输出的 "`Control Tree`" 部分中。When you enable tracing, either for a page or for your application, this information is displayed in the `Control Tree` section of the trace output. 页面的跟踪输出将追加到页面的末尾;尽管可以从存储在应用程序的根目录中的跟踪查看器（trace.axd 文件）查看应用程序的跟踪输出。Trace output for a page is appended to the end of the page; while trace output for an application can be viewed from the trace viewer (trace.axd file) which is stored in the application's root directory. 有关跟踪的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 跟踪概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386420(v=vs.100))。For more information about tracing, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386420(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 删除服务器控件的子控件的控件状态信息。

span.span: Deletes the control-state information for the server control's child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建新的子控件（如在模板化数据绑定服务器控件中对子控件进行数据绑定时），当写入父控件的控件状态时，将使用 方法。The method is used when child control-state information written to the parent control's control state is overridden as new child controls are created, such as when data-binding child controls in a templated data-bound server control. 在调用 方法之前调用 方法为空子控件将减小必须存储或传输的控件状态信息的大小。Calling the method to empty child controls before calling the method reduces the size of the control-state information that must be stored or transmitted. 当重新创建 对象的子控件时，请使用 方法清除子控件状态，以便不会无意中将其应用于新控件。When recreating child controls of a object, use the method to clear child control state so that it does not get applied to the new controls inadvertently. 若要清除子控件状态和视图状态，请使用 方法。To clear both the child control state and view state, use the method.

span.span: Deletes the view-state and control-state information for all the server control's child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除子控件的所有视图状态和控件状态信息。The method clears all view-state and control-state information for child controls. 它等效于同时调用 方法和 方法。It is equivalent to calling both the method and the method. 当重新创建 对象的子控件时，请使用 方法清除子状态，以便不会无意中将其应用于新控件。When recreating child controls of a object, use the method to clear child state so that it does not get applied to the new controls inadvertently. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写模板化数据绑定控件的 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method for a templated data-bound control. 如果填充了控件绑定到的数据源，则使用 方法清空控件的 集合， 方法用于删除为子控件保存的任何状态信息。If the data source that the control binds to is populated, the control's collection is emptied using the method, and the method is used to remove any state information that had been saved for the child controls. [!code-csharp[TemplatedDataBoundControl2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl2/cs/templatedataboundcontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TemplatedDataBoundControl2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl2/vb/templatedataboundcontrol.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你在开发模板化数据绑定服务器控件时重写 方法时，通常会使用此方法。This method is commonly used when you override the method when developing templated data-bound server controls. 如果不调用此方法，则可以将子控件视图状态信息写入父服务器控件，仅在绑定数据时重写。If you do not call this method, child control view-state information can be written to a parent server control, only to be overridden when the data is bound. 重新创建 的子控件时，请使用 方法清除子视图状态，以便不会无意中将其应用于新控件。When recreating child controls of a , use the method to clear child view state so that it does not get applied to the new controls inadvertently. 有关使用此方法的详细信息，请参阅[如何：创建模板化 ASP.NET 用户控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/36574bf6(v=vs.100))。For more information about using this method, see [How to: Create Templated ASP.NET User Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/36574bf6(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取由 ASP.NET 生成的 HTML 标记的控件 ID。

span.span: Gets the control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.

value.span: 由 ASP.NET 生成的 HTML 标记的控件 ID。

span.span: The control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 Web 服务器控件呈现为 HTML 元素时，HTML 元素的 `id` 特性将设置为 属性的值。When a Web server control is rendered as an HTML element, the `id` attribute of the HTML element is set to the value of the property. 值通常用于通过使用 `document.getElementById` 方法来访问客户端脚本中的 HTML 元素。The value is often used to access the HTML element in client script by using the `document.getElementById` method. 该 ID 还经常用在 CSS 规则中来指定要样式的元素。The ID is also often used in CSS rules to specify elements to style. 例如，以下 CSS 样式规则选择 `id` 属性值为 "`ProductIDLabel`" 的所有 `span` 元素，并将其 `background-color` 特性设置为 `white`：For example, the following CSS style rule selects all `span` elements that have the `id` attribute value of `ProductIDLabel` and sets their `background-color` attribute to `white`: ``` span#ProductIDLabel { background-color: white; } ``` ASP.NET 提供多种算法用于生成 属性值。ASP.NET provides multiple algorithms for how to generate the property value. 通过设置控件的 属性，可以选择要用于控件的算法。You select which algorithm to use for a control by setting its property. 算法由下表中列出的 枚举值标识。The algorithms are identified by the enumeration values that are listed in the following table. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| || 值是通过串联每个父命名容器的 值生成的，这些父命名容器都具有控件的 值。The value is generated by concatenating the values of each parent naming container with the value of the control. 在呈现控件的多个实例的数据绑定方案中，将在控件的 值的前面插入递增的值。In data-binding scenarios where multiple instances of a control are rendered, an incrementing value is inserted in front of the control's value. 各部分之间用下划线字符 (_) 分隔。Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_). 此算法用于早于 ASP.NET 4 的 ASP.NET 版本。This algorithm was used in versions of ASP.NET earlier than ASP.NET 4.| || 值设置为 属性的值。The value is set to the value of the property. 如果控件是命名容器，则该控件将用作其所包含的任何控件的命名容器的顶层。If the control is a naming container, the control is used as the top of the hierarchy of naming containers for any controls that it contains.| ||对于数据绑定控件中的控件使用此算法。This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls. 值是通过串联每个父命名容器的 值生成的，这些父命名容器都具有控件的 值。The value is generated by concatenating the value of the parent naming container with the value of the control. 如果控件是生成多个行的数据绑定控件，则在末尾添加 属性中指定的数据字段的值。If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the property is added at the end. 对于 控件，可以指定多个数据字段。For the control, multiple data fields can be specified. 如果 属性为空白，则在末尾添加顺序号，而非数据字段值。If the property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data-field value. 各部分之间用下划线字符 (_) 分隔。Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).| ||控件继承其 控件的 设置。The control inherits the setting of its control.| 页面 的默认值为 ""。The default value of for a page is . 控件的 默认值为 。The default value of for a control is . 由于控件的默认值为 ，因此 默认生成模式。Because the default for controls is , the default generation mode is . （但是，如果使用 Visual Studio 将 Web 项目从早期版本转换为 ASP.NET 4，则 Visual Studio 会自动将该站点默认设置为 Web.config 文件中的 。）(However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to in the Web.config file.) 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件标识](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/1d04y8ss(v=vs.140))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/1d04y8ss(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示在母版页的内容页内的 Web 用户控件。The following examples show a Web user control that is inside a content page for a master page. 用户控件包含 控件和 控件。The user control contains a control and a control. 控件中显示的文本由用户从 控件中选择的值确定。The text that is displayed in the control is determined by the value that the user selects from the control. 文本值是通过客户端脚本设置的，因此，网页不必回发到服务器即可设置此值。The text value is set through client script so that the Web page does not have to post back to the server in order to set this value. 若要获取对在客户端脚本中为 控件呈现的 HTML 元素的引用，必须知道控件的 属性的值。To get a reference to the HTML element that is rendered for the control in client script, you must know the value of the control's property. 但是，因为用户控件可以放在网页中的任何位置，所以无法事先知道哪些命名容器将包含这些控件。However, because the user control can be put anywhere in a Web page, it is impossible to know in advance which naming containers will contain the controls. 为了确保 值将与 值相同，代码会将 值设置为 。To make sure that the value will be the same as the value, the code sets the value to . 下面的示例演示用户控件。The following example shows the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.clientidmode/common/seasons.ascx)] 下面的示例显示包含用户控件的内容页。The following example shows the content page that contains the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.clientidmode/common/seasons.aspx)] 下面的示例演示包含内容页的母版页。The following example shows the master page that contains the content page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode#3](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.clientidmode/common/seasons.master)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可让你访问当前 Web 请求的 对象。This property gives you access to the object for the current Web request. 对象提供的属性可访问 、、、 以及包含有关当前 HTTP 请求的信息的其他对象。The object provides properties that access the , , , and other objects that contain information about the current HTTP request. 它还提供了一些方法，可用于获取配置信息并为请求设置或清除错误。It also provides methods that allow you to obtain configuration information and set or clear errors for the request. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Control_Context_OnInit_ResolveUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control_Context_OnInit_ResolveUrl/CS/control1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Control_Context_OnInit_ResolveUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control_Context_OnInit_ResolveUrl/VB/control1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象表示 UI 层次结构中的指定服务器控件的子控件。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the child controls for a specified server control in the UI hierarchy.

value.span: 指定服务器控件的子控件的集合。

span.span: The collection of child controls for the specified server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 页上，如果在服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间以声明方式添加控件，则 ASP.NET 会自动将控件添加到包含服务器控件的 。On an ASP.NET page, when controls are added declaratively between the opening and closing tags of a server control, ASP.NET automatically adds the controls to the containing server control's . 未在服务器上处理的任何 HTML 标记或文本字符串都将被视为 的对象。Any HTML tags or text strings that are not processed on the server are treated as objects. 这些将添加到集合中，如其他服务器控件。These are added to the collection like other server controls. 属性允许你以编程方式访问任何服务器控件的 类的实例。The property allows you programmatic access to the instance of the class for any server control. 您可以向集合添加控件、从集合中移除控件或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。You can add controls to the collection, remove controls from the collection, or iterate through the server controls in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过其 属性将子控件添加到服务器控件的 对象。The following example demonstrates how to add child controls to a server control's object through its property. [!code-csharp[Classic Control.Controls Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control.Controls Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Control.Controls Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control.Controls Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 重写 属性时，请确保调用 方法。

span.span: When overriding the property, be sure to call the method.

para.span: 此外，如果计划以编程方式将控件添加到控件集合，请考虑在重写的 方法中添加控件。

span.span: Furthermore, if you are planning to add controls to the controls collection programmatically, consider adding the controls in an overridden method.

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 页框架调用，以通知服务器控件在准备回发或呈现时使用基于撰写的实现来创建其所包含任何子控件。

span.span: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 开发复合服务器控件或模板化服务器控件时，必须重写此方法。When you develop a composite or templated server control, you must override this method. 重写 方法的控件应实现 接口，以避免命名冲突。Controls that override the method should implement the interface to avoid naming conflicts. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件模板](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/h59db326(v=vs.100))和[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zt27tfhy(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/h59db326(v=vs.100)) and [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zt27tfhy(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的重写版本。The following example demonstrates an overridden version of the method. 在此实现中，复合控件将显示 一个控件，该控件包含在呈现 HTML 的两个文本控件中。In this implementation, the composite control displays a control enclosed in two literal controls that render HTML. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/CS/compositecontrolsample1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/VB/compositecontrolsample1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到调用的服务器控件及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可将数据从源绑定到服务器控件。Use this method to bind data from a source to a server control. 此方法通常在通过数据库查询检索数据集之后使用。This method is commonly used after retrieving a dataset through a database query. 大多数控件会自动执行数据绑定，这意味着您通常不需要显式调用此方法。Most controls perform data binding automatically, which means that you typically do not need to call this method explicitly. 当您创建自定义模板化数据绑定控件时，通常会重写此方法。This method is commonly overridden when you create a custom templated data-bound control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：创建模板化 ASP.NET 用户控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/36574bf6(v=vs.100))和[开发自定义数据绑定 Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms366539(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [How to: Create Templated ASP.NET User Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/36574bf6(v=vs.100)) and [Developing Custom Data-Bound Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms366539(v=vs.100)). 在服务器控件上调用时，此方法解析服务器控件及其任何子控件中的所有数据绑定表达式。When called on a server control, this method resolves all data-binding expressions in the server control and in any of its child controls. ## Examples 下面的示例重写自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的 方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 首先，将调用基 方法，然后使用 方法删除所有子控件，并使用 方法删除这些子控件的任何已保存的视图状态设置。It begins by calling the base method and then uses the method to delete all the child controls and the method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls. 最后， 属性设置为 `true`，并指示控件通过 方法跟踪对新创建的控件的视图状态所做的任何更改。Finally, the property is set to `true` and the control is instructed to track any changes to the view state of the newly created controls with the method. 这是将数据绑定到控件以确保新数据与先前 方法调用中存储的数据不冲突的常用技术。This is a common technique when binding data to a control to ensure that new data does not conflict with data stored from a previous method call. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_state.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_state.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当自定义控件重写 方法并实现 接口时，在方案中使用 方法。Use the method in a scenario when your custom control overrides the method and implements the interface. 在此方案中，自定义控件调用 方法，并将 `raiseOnDataBinding` 设置为 `false`，以确保调用基类的 方法。In this scenario, the custom control calls the method with `raiseOnDataBinding` set to `false` to ensure that the base class's method gets called. 方法将调用 方法，并将 `raiseOnDataBinding` 设置为 `true`。The method invokes the method with `raiseOnDataBinding` set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在将 `raiseOnDataBinding` 设置为 `false` 时调用 方法将导致所有子控件都与 方法进行数据绑定。Calling the method with `raiseOnDataBinding` set to `false` causes any child controls to be data bound with the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为指定控件启用主题。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for a specified control. `true` 属性时，将在应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果主题目录中不存在特定控件的外观，则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied. 当 `false` 属性时，不会搜索主题目录，也不会使用 属性的内容。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the content of the property is not used. 可以在页、容器或控件级别启用主题。Themes can be enabled at the page, container, or control level. 控件可以重写由其父控件或由包含页设置的 值。A control can override the value set by its parent control, or by the containing page.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务器控件是否向发出请求的客户端保持自己的视图状态以及它所包含的任何子控件的视图状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server control persists its view state, and the view state of any child controls it contains, to the requesting client.

value.span: 如果服务器控件保持其视图状态，则否 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the server control maintains its view state; otherwise .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态使服务器控件能够跨 HTTP 请求维护其状态。View state enables a server control to maintain its state across HTTP requests. 如果满足以下所有条件，则会启用控件的视图状态：View state for a control is enabled if all of the following conditions are met: - 该页的 属性设置为 `true`。The property for the page is set to `true`. - 控件的 属性设置为 `true`。The property for the control is set to `true`. - 控件的 属性设置为 或继承 设置。The property for the control is set to or inherits the setting. 有关详细信息，请参阅 属性。For more information, see the property. 服务器控件的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 为了跨 HTTP 请求保留这些值，ASP.NET 使用 类的实例来存储属性值。In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET uses an instance of the class to store the property values. 然后，在处理后续请求时，这些值将作为变量传递给隐藏的字段。The values are then passed as a variable to a hidden field when subsequent requests are processed. 有关视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 视图状态概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386448(v=vs.100))。For more information about view state, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386448(v=vs.100)). 在某些情况下，需要禁用视图状态，尤其是为了提高应用程序性能。There are times when it is appropriate to disable view state, particularly to improve application performance. 例如，如果要将数据库请求加载到服务器控件中，请将此属性设置为 `false`。For example, if you are loading a database request into a server control, set this property to `false`. 如果不这样做，则会浪费处理器时间，将视图状态加载到仅被数据库查询重写的服务器控件中。If you do not, processor time will be wasted loading view state into the server control that will only be overridden by the database query. 如果 `false`，则可以使用控件状态保存特定于控件的属性信息，并且不能像视图状态属性那样关闭。If is `false`, you can use the control state to persist property information that is specific to a control and cannot be turned off like the view state property. 有关控件状态和视图状态之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[控件状态与视图状态示例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/1whwt1k7(v=vs.100))。For more information on the difference between control state and view state, see [Control State vs. View State Example](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/1whwt1k7(v=vs.100)). 有关如何以声明方式为 ASP.NET 页启用或禁用视图状态的信息，请参阅[\@ "页](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))。For information about how to enable or disable view state declaratively for an ASP.NET page, see [\@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例将 属性设置为 `false`。The following example sets the property to `false`. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_statemanagement.cs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_statemanagement.vb.aspx#7)]

span.span: Determines whether the server control contains child controls.

span.span: If it does not, it creates child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法首先检查 属性的当前值。This method first checks the current value of the property. 如果 `false`此值，则调用 方法。If this value is `false`, the method is called. 方法通常用在复合控件中，复合控件是将子控件用于部分或全部功能的控件。The method is typically used in composite controls, which are controls that use child controls for some or all their functionality. 调用 方法是为了确保已创建子控件并准备好处理输入、执行数据绑定或执行其他任务。The method is called in order to make sure that child controls have been created and are ready to process input, to perform data binding, or to perform other tasks. 控件是复合控件的一个示例。The control is an example of a composite control. 它创建 、、、和 控件等子控件，这些控件用于呈现 生成的 HTML 表。It creates child controls such as , , , , and controls, which are used to render the HTML table that the generates. 在大多数情况下，自定义服务器控件开发人员不必重写此方法。In most cases, custom server control developers do not have to override this method. 如果确实要重写此方法，请使用类似于默认行为的方式。If you do override this method, use it in a way similar to the default behavior. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法确保当前服务器控件具有子控件。The following example uses the method to ensure that the current server control has child controls. 然后，它获取或设置当前服务器控件的 对象中子 Web 控件的 属性。It then gets or sets a property for a child Web control in the current server control's object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/CS/compositecontrolsample1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/VB/compositecontrolsample1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的类型为 ，它使用线性搜索算法查找委托列表中的项。This property is of type , which uses a linear search algorithm to find entries in the list of delegates. 线性搜索算法在处理大量条目时效率低下。A linear search algorithm is inefficient when working with a large number of entries. 因此，当您有一个较大的列表时，查找具有此属性的条目的速度会很慢。Therefore, when you have a large list, finding entries with this property will be slow. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为 `Click`的事件，该事件在从页中调用事件时在控件的 集合中添加和移除处理程序。The following example creates an event, named `Click`, that adds and removes handlers from the control's collection when the event is called from a page. > [!NOTE] > 此示例优化了控件在控件所维护的列表中添加和删除事件的方式。This example optimizes how a control adds and removes events from the list of them that the control maintains. 如果创建自定义控件并要定义事件，请使用类似于下面的代码。If you create custom control and want to define an event, use code similar to this. 此方法可在中使用 C# ，但不能在 Visual Basic 中使用。This technique can be used in C#, but not in Visual Basic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 可以从代码隐藏页中的函数访问控件、访问位于另一个容器内的控件，或访问调用方无法直接访问目标控件的其他情况。Use to access a control from a function in a code-behind page, to access a control that is inside another container, or in other circumstances where the target control is not directly accessible to the caller. 仅当指定容器直接包含控件时，此方法才会找到控件;也就是说，该方法不在控件内的控件层次结构中进行搜索。This method will find a control only if the control is directly contained by the specified container; that is, the method does not search throughout a hierarchy of controls within controls. 有关如何在不知道控件的即时容器的情况下查找控件的信息，请参阅[如何：按 ID 访问服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/y81z8326(v=vs.100))。For information about how to find a control when you do not know its immediate container, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/y81z8326(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例定义 `Button1_Click` 事件处理程序。The following example defines a `Button1_Click` event handler. 在调用时，此处理程序使用 方法在包含页上查找具有 `TextBox2` 的 属性的控件。When invoked, this handler uses the method to locate a control with an property of `TextBox2` on the containing page. 如果找到了该控件，则使用 属性确定其父级，并且父控件的 将写入页面。If the control is found, its parent is determined using the property and the parent control's is written to the page. 如果找不到 `TextBox2`，则将 "找不到控制" 写入页面。If `TextBox2` is not found, "Control Not Found" is written to the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.Parent_FindControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.Parent_FindControl/CS/control_parent.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.Parent_FindControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.Parent_FindControl/VB/control_parent.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 为控件设置输入焦点。

span.span: Sets input focus to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将网页的初始焦点设置为控件。Use the method to set the initial focus of the Web page to the control. 将在浏览器中打开该控件并选定控件。The page will be opened in the browser with the control selected. 方法导致在呈现的页面上发出对页面焦点脚本的调用。The method causes a call to the page focus script to be emitted on the rendered page. 如果该页不包含具有与调用了 方法的控件的 HTML `ID` 特性相匹配的控件，则将不会设置页焦点。If the page does not contain a control with an HTML `ID` attribute that matches the control that the method was invoked on, then page focus will not be set. 例如，在用户控件上设置焦点，而不是将焦点设置到用户控件的子控件上时，就会发生这种情况。An example where this can occur is when you set the focus on a user control instead of setting the focus on a child control of the user control. 在此方案中，可以使用 方法查找用户控件的子控件并调用其 方法。In this scenario, you can use the method to find the child control of the user control and invoke its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服务器控件上设置此属性可提供对服务器控件的属性、事件和方法的编程访问。Setting this property on a server control provides you with programmatic access to the server control's properties, events, and methods. Web 开发人员可以通过在 ASP.NET 服务器控件的开始标记中声明 特性来设置此属性。This property can be set by Web developers by declaring an attribute in the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control. 如果未以声明方式或编程方式为服务器控件指定此属性，则可以通过其父控件的 属性获取对该控件的引用。If this property is not specified for a server control, either declaratively or programmatically, you can obtain a reference to the control through its parent control's property. > [!NOTE] > 只有字母数字字符和下划线字符（_）的组合是此属性的有效值。Only combinations of alphanumeric characters and the underscore character ( _ ) are valid values for this property. 包括空格或其他无效字符将导致 ASP.NET 页分析器错误。Including spaces or other invalid characters will cause an ASP.NET page parser error. ## Examples [!code-csharp[Control_Sample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample/CS/controlclass_samples.cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[Control_Sample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample/VB/controlclass_samples.vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件应执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。Server controls should perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 此事件内不能使用视图状态信息;尚未填充。You cannot use view-state information within this event; it is not populated yet. 不应在此事件期间访问另一个服务器控件，而不管它是此控件的子控件还是父控件。You should not access another server control during this event, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不一定要创建其他服务器控件并准备好进行访问。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access. 有关服务器控件事件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体服务器控件事件模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/y3bwdsh3(v=vs.100))。For more information on server control events, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/y3bwdsh3(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例将自定义事件处理程序 `Calendar_Init`分配给 控件的 `Init` 事件。The following example assigns a custom event handler, `Calendar_Init`, to the `Init` event of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例将重写自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件的 方法。The following example overrides the method for a custom ASP.NET server control. 它将创建一个 数组以包含传入 `savedState` 参数的视图状态信息，然后调用该数组的第一个索引位置的 方法的基实现。It creates an array to contain the view state information passed in the `savedState` parameter, and then calls the base implementation of the method for the first index location of the array. 它将存储在接下来两个索引位置的值分配给分别为 `UserText` 和 `PasswordText`的变量。It assigns the values stored at the next two index locations to variables named `UserText` and `PasswordText`, respectively. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当父控件将视图状态加载到它创建的子控件中时，它会通过父控件的 集合中每个子控件的位置来执行此项。By default, when a parent control loads view state into child controls it creates, it does this by the position of each child control in the parent control's collection. 最初应用视图状态时，可能尚未创建所有子控件。When view state is initially applied, all child controls might not have been created. 在这种情况下，将保存尚未创建的控件的视图状态，并在以后创建子控件时应用该视图状态。In this case, the view state for controls not yet created is saved, and applied when the child controls are created later. 若要让父控件将视图状态应用到其子控件，必须满足两个条件：For a parent control to apply view state to its child controls, two conditions must be met: - 在回发时，父控件必须按与上一个请求完全相同的顺序创建子控件，以便控件的顺序保持一致。On postback, the parent control must create the child controls in exactly the same order as the previous request so that the order of the controls remains consistent. - 回发之后，必须将创建的任何子控件添加到父控件的 集合的末尾。After postback, any child controls created must be added to the end of the parent control's collection. 如果不满足这两个条件，例如，在创建子控件的延迟的情况下，父控件可以使用 加载视图状态。If these two conditions cannot be met, as in the case of the delayed creation of a child control, the parent control can load view state by using . 若要将 属性设置为 `true`，请使用父控件的 元数据特性。To set the property to `true`, use the metadata attribute for the parent control.

summary.span: 获取对服务器控件的命名容器的引用，此引用创建唯一的命名空间，以区分具有相同 属性值的服务器控件。

span.span: Gets a reference to the server control's naming container, which creates a unique namespace for differentiating between server controls with the same property value.

value.span: 服务器控件的命名容器。

span.span: The server control's naming container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET Web 应用程序中的每一页都包含一个控件层次结构。Each page in an ASP.NET Web application contains a hierarchy of controls. 此层次结构不依赖于控件是否生成向用户显示的 UI。This hierarchy is not dependent on whether a control generates UI visible to the user. 给定控件的命名容器是实现 接口的层次结构中其上方的父控件。The naming container for a given control is the parent control above it in the hierarchy that implements the interface. 实现此接口的服务器控件为其子服务器控件的 属性值创建唯一的命名空间。A server control that implements this interface creates a unique namespace for the property values of its child server controls. 可以使用命名容器的子控件的 属性来获取对其父容器的引用。You can use the property of a naming container's child control to get a reference to its parent container. 在将 Web 服务器控件绑定到数据（如 和 服务器控件）时，为服务器控件创建唯一的命名空间非常重要。Creating a unique namespace for server controls is particularly important when you bind Web server controls to data, such as the and server controls. 当数据源中的多个条目创建的服务器控件的多个实例是重复控件的子控件时，命名容器将确保这些子控件的每个实例都具有不冲突的 属性值。When multiple entries in the data source create multiple instances of a server control that is a child of the repeating control, the naming container ensures that each instance of these child controls have property values that do not conflict. 页面的默认命名容器是请求该页面时生成的 类的实例。The default naming container for a page is the instance of the class that is generated when that page is requested. 属性包含在 HTML 标记中呈现为元素的 `id` 特性的值。The property contains the value that is rendered as the element's `id` attribute in the HTML markup. 根据分配给 属性的值，为 属性生成的值可能包括 对象的 ID。Depending on the value that you assign to the property, the value that is generated for the property might include the ID of the object. 将 设置为 时， 值不包含 对象的 ID。When you set to , the value does not include the ID of the object. 将 设置为 或 时， 值将包括来自 对象的 ID。When you set to either or , the value will include the ID from the object. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件标识](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/1d04y8ss(v=vs.140))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/1d04y8ss(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example demonstrates using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 、 和 Web 控件等 ASP.NET 服务器控件可以包含引发事件的子控件。ASP.NET server controls such as the , and Web controls can contain child controls that raise events. 例如， 控件中的每一行都可以包含一个或多个由模板动态创建的按钮。For example, each row in a control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates. 嵌套控件中的事件是 "冒泡" 的，而不是每个按钮单独引发事件，也就是说，它们被发送到命名容器。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled" - that is, they are sent to the naming container. 命名容器反过来使用参数值引发名为 的泛型事件。The naming container in turn raises a generic event called with parameter values. 这些值允许您确定引发原始事件的单个控件。These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event. 通过响应此单个事件，你可以避免为子控件编写单独的事件处理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls. ## Examples 下面的示例将重写自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的 方法，`ParentControl`。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control, `ParentControl`. 当 `ParentControl` 的子控件调用 方法时，将调用此方法。This method is invoked when a child control of `ParentControl` calls the method. 发生这种情况时，`ParentControl` 类会将两个字符串写入包含 ASP.NET 页，第一个声明已调用了其 方法，第二个字符串标识 方法的源代码管理。When this happens, the `ParentControl` class writes two strings to the containing ASP.NET page, the first stating that its method has been called, the second identifying the source control of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个 对象，该对象可用于读取 `path` 参数中指定的文件的内容。The method returns a object that can be used to read the contents of the file specified in the `path` parameter. Path 参数可以是不带协议的相对或根 URL （如 "~/mySite/myFile.txt"），也可以是物理路径（本地（"c:\mySite\myFile.txt"）或 UNC （"\\\myServer\myFile.txt"）。The path parameter can be either a relative or root URL without a protocol (such as "~/mySite/myFile.txt), or a physical path, either local ("c:\mySite\myFile.txt") or UNC ("\\\myServer\myFile.txt"). 方法使用文件访问安全性来控制对指定文件的访问。The method uses file access security to control access to the specified file. 如果当前 ASP.NET 用户无权访问该文件，则不会打开该文件，并引发 异常以指示拒绝访问。If the current ASP.NET user does not have access to the file, then the file is not opened and an exception is thrown to indicate that access was denied. 如果 `path` 参数指定了相对路径，则异常不包含有关所请求文件的物理路径的信息。If the `path` parameter specified a relative path, the exception does not include information about the physical path to the requested file.

exception.span: 对指定文件的访问被拒绝。

span.span: Access to the specified file was denied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次请求页面时，将生成该页面上的服务器控件的层次结构。Whenever a page is requested, a hierarchy of server controls on that page is built. 此属性允许您确定该层次结构中当前服务器控件的父控件，并对其进行编程。This property allows you to determine the parent control of the current server control in that hierarchy, and to program against it. ## Examples 下面的示例将页上的新 对象（`myControl1`）设置为 方法调用中指定的控件。The following example sets a new object on a page, `myControl1`, to the control specified in a method call. 如果调用返回了一个控件，则该代码使用 属性标识包含 `myControl1`的控件。If the call returns a control, the code uses the property to identify the control that contains `myControl1`. 如果父控件存在，则字符串 "文本框的父对象将与父控件的 属性连接并写入 。If the parent control exists, the string "The parent of the text box is" is concatenated with the property of the parent control and written to the . 如果找不到父控件，则写入字符串 "找不到控制"。If no parent control is found, the string "Control not found" is written. remarks.format: ## Remarks 、 和 Web 控件等 ASP.NET 服务器控件可以包含引发事件的子控件。ASP.NET server controls such as the , and Web controls can contain child controls that raise events. 例如， 控件中的每一行都可以包含一个或多个由模板动态创建的按钮。For example, each row in a control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates. 嵌套控件中的事件是 "冒泡" 的，而不是每个按钮单独引发事件，也就是说，它们被发送到控件的父级。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled" - that is, they are sent to the control's parent. 父对象进而引发名为 的泛型事件，其参数值为。The parent in turn raises a generic event called with parameter values. 这些值允许您确定引发原始事件的单个控件。These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event. 通过响应此单个事件，你可以避免为子控件编写单独的事件处理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls. 尽管不能重写此方法，但作者可以通过重写 方法来处理或引发冒泡事件。While you cannot override this method, controls you author can handle or raise bubbled events by overriding the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个自定义类，`ChildControl`，重写 方法，以调用将 事件发送到其父 ASP.NET 服务器控件的 方法。The following code example demonstrate how to create a custom class, `ChildControl`, overriding the method to call the method that sends the event to its parent ASP.NET server control. 用户单击包含 `ChildControl`实例的 ASP.NET 页面中的按钮时，它会在包含 `ChildControl` 实例的父控件上引发 方法，并将字符串 "ChildControl 类 OnClick 方法称为" 写入页面。When the user clicks a button in an ASP.NET page that includes an instance of `ChildControl`, it raises the method on the parent control that contains the instance of `ChildControl` and writes the string "The ChildControl class OnClick method is called" to the page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent/CS/bubble.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent/VB/bubble.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通知 ASP.NET 在页面上呈现任何活动服务器页（ASP）代码。This method notifies ASP.NET to render any Active Server Pages (ASP) code on the page. 如果该页不存在任何 ASP 代码，则此方法将呈现服务器控件的任何子控件。If no ASP code exists on the page, this method renders any child controls for the server control. 此方法由 方法调用。This method is called by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例重写自定义服务器控件中的 方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom server control. 它确定当前控件在其 对象中是否有任何子控件。It determines whether the current control has any child controls in its object. 如果是，它将使用 属性来循环访问集合。If it does, it uses the property to iterate through the collection. 在遇到每个子控件时，它使用 方法将父控件及其所有子控件呈现给包含页。As it encounters each child control, it uses the method to render the parent control, and all of its child controls, to the containing page. 然后，重写的 方法调用重写的 方法。The overridden method then calls the overridden method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果服务器控件的 属性设置为 `true`，则此方法将确定是否为该页启用跟踪。If a server control's property is set to `true`, this method determines whether tracing is enabled for the page. 如果是这样，它将存储与控件相关联的跟踪信息，并将服务器控件内容呈现到页面。If so, it stores trace information associated with the control, and renders the server control content to the page. 此方法在呈现期间由页面自动调用，但可由自定义控件开发人员重写。This method is automatically called by the page during the rendering, but can be overridden by custom control developers. ## Examples 下面的示例重写自定义服务器控件中的 方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom server control. 它确定当前控件在其 对象中是否有任何子控件。It determines whether the current control has any child controls in its object. 如果是，它将使用 属性来循环访问集合。If it does, it uses the property to iterate through the collection. 在遇到每个子控件时，它使用 方法将子控件及其所有子控件呈现给包含页。As it encounters each child control, it uses the method to render the child control, and all of its child controls, to the containing page. 传递给此方法的 对象由 方法实例化。The object that is passed to this method is instantiated by the method. [!code-csharp[Control_Sample_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample_1/CS/control_sample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Control_Sample_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample_1/VB/control_sample.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从 Web 请求信息的各种设备和浏览器中使用 ASP.NET 网页。ASP.NET Web pages are usable across a wide range of devices and browsers that can request information from the Web. 属性返回 对象，该对象在请求设备或浏览器的屏幕上呈现控件。The property returns the object that renders the control on the requesting device or browser's screen. 有关适配器的详细信息，请参阅[自适应控制行为的体系结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information about adapters, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)). 如果服务器控件的 属性设置为 `true` 并为该页启用了跟踪，则将捕获与该控件关联的跟踪信息。If a server control's property is set to `true` and tracing is enabled for the page, then trace information associated with the control is captured.

para.span: 重写自定义控件中的 方法时，调用基类方法以确保正确捕获跟踪信息。

span.span: When overriding the method in custom controls, call the base class method to ensure trace information is correctly captured.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定呈现的 HTML 将与之兼容的 ASP.NET 版本。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies the ASP.NET version that rendered HTML will be compatible with.

value.span: 呈现的 HTML 将与之兼容的 ASP.NET 版本。

span.span: The ASP.NET version that rendered HTML will be compatible with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 将此属性设置为 Web.config 文件中 `pages` 元素的 `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` 特性的值。ASP.NET sets this property to the value of the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file. 如果未在 web.config 文件中设置 `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` 属性，则默认值为 ASP.NET 的当前版本。If the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute is not set in the Web.config file, the default value is the current version of ASP.NET. > [!CAUTION] > 此属性有一个公共 set 访问器，但 set 访问器支持 .NET Framework 基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。There is a public set accessor for this property, but the set accessor supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 如果您在代码中设置此值，则效果是不可预知的。If you set this value in your code, the effect is unpredictable. 每个版本的 ASP.NET 可能会以不同于早期版本的方式呈现 HTML。Each release of ASP.NET might render HTML differently from earlier releases. 例如，在 ASP.NET 3.5 中，如果 控件的 属性为 `false`，则默认情况下，ASP.NET 将呈现一个 `span` 元素，其 `disabled` 特性设置为 "disabled"。For example, in ASP.NET 3.5, if the property of a control is `false`, by default, ASP.NET renders a `span` element whose `disabled` attribute is set to "disabled". 在 ASP.NET 4 中，默认情况下，使用级联样式表（CSS） `class` 特性而不是 `disabled` 特性呈现 `span` 元素。In ASP.NET 4, by default, the `span` element is rendered with a cascading style sheet (CSS) `class` attribute instead of the `disabled` attribute. 这使您可以指定控件的禁用外观，并避免呈现无效的 HTML。This lets you specify the disabled appearance of the control and avoids rendering invalid HTML. （在 HTML 4.0 和 XHTML 1.1 中，`span` 元素不支持 `disabled` 特性。）(In HTML 4.0 and XHTML 1.1, the `span` element does not support the `disabled` attribute.) 如果 HTML 呈现发生更改，则 Web 应用程序可能包含无法正常工作的代码。A Web application might include code that would not function correctly if HTML rendering changes. 若要避免此问题，可以在 web.config 文件中设置 `pages` 元素的 `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` 属性，以指示要保持与兼容的早期版本。To avoid this problem, you can set the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file to indicate which earlier version you want to maintain compatibility with. 例如，如果将 属性设置为 `3.5`，禁用的 控件将呈现 `disabled` 特性而不是 CSS 类。For example, if you set the property to `3.5`, a disabled control will render a `disabled` attribute and not a CSS class. > [!NOTE] > 可将此属性设置为 `3.5`的最早版本。The earliest version that you can set this property to is `3.5`. 为了保持向后兼容性，使用 Visual Studio 将 Web 项目从早期版本升级到 ASP.NET 4 时，Visual Studio 会自动将 web.config 文件中的 `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` 属性设置为 `3.5`。To maintain backward compatibility, when you use Visual Studio to upgrade a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute in the Web.config file to `3.5`. 如果希望已升级的网站使用 ASP.NET 4 中引入的算法呈现 HTML，则可以更改或删除 `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` 特性。If you want an upgraded Web site to render HTML using the algorithm that was introduced in ASP.NET 4, you can change or remove the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute. 大多数情况下，此属性控制的行为是自动的，无需在代码中检查 属性。Most of the time, the behavior controlled by this property is automatic and you do not have to check the property in your code. 但是，如果你正在编程自定义控件，则可能必须包含用于根据此属性的设置更改控件行为的代码。However, if you are programming a custom control, you might have to include code that alters the control's behavior based on the setting of this property. 例如，ASP.NET 4 的自定义控件可能由 控件组成，自定义控件通过生成更改 `aspNetDisabled` 类的 JavaScript 代码，可以指定控件的禁用外观。For example, a custom control for ASP.NET 4 might be composed of controls, and the custom control might specify the disabled appearance of the control by generating JavaScript code that alters the `aspNetDisabled` class. 如果 `4.0` 或更高版本，则此操作将按预期方式工作。This will work as expected if is `4.0` or later. 但是，若要在 `3.5`时获得相同的效果，在 `false` 属性时，自定义控件的代码必须将控件的 `CssClass` 属性设置为 "aspNetDisabled"。But to get the same effect when is `3.5`, the custom control's code must set the control's `CssClass` property to "aspNetDisabled" when the property is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 网页可在各种设备上查看，这些设备能够从 Web 请求页面。ASP.NET Web pages are viewable across a wide range of devices that are capable of requesting pages from the Web. 方法返回控件适配器，该适配器负责在请求 ASP.NET 页的特定浏览器或设备上呈现控件。The method returns the control adapter responsible for rendering the control on the specific browser or device that requested the ASP.NET page. 返回的特定适配器类型取决于所呈现的 类的派生类型。The specific adapter type returned depends on the descendent type of the class that is being rendered. 有关适配器的详细信息，请参阅[自适应控制行为的体系结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information about adapters, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `relativeUrl` 参数包含绝对 URL，则返回的 URL 保持不变。If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains an absolute URL, the URL is returned unchanged. 如果 `relativeUrl` 参数包含相对 URL，则会将该 URL 更改为对当前请求路径正确的相对 URL，以便浏览器可以解析 URL。If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains a relative URL, that URL is changed to a relative URL that is correct for the current request path, so that the browser can resolve the URL. 例如，请考虑以下情况：For example, consider the following scenario: - 客户端已请求一个 ASP.NET 页，其中包含一个用户控件，该控件包含一个与之关联的图像。A client has requested an ASP.NET page that contains a user control that has an image associated with it. - ASP.NET 页位于/Store/page1.aspx。The ASP.NET page is located at /Store/page1.aspx. - 用户控件位于/Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx。The user control is located at /Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx. - 映像文件位于/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg。The image file is located at /UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg. 如果用户控件将图像的相对路径（即/Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg）传递到 方法，则该方法将返回值/Images/image1.jpg。If the user control passes the relative path to the image (that is, /Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg) to the method, the method will return the value /Images/Image1.jpg. 此方法使用 属性解析为绝对 URL。This method uses the property to resolve to the absolute URL. 返回的 URL 供客户端使用。The returned URL is for client use. 有关网站中的资源路径的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目路径](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178116(v=vs.100))。For more information on resource paths in a Web site, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178116(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 仅对于移动网页，如果应用程序依赖于无 cookie 的会话，或者可能接收到需要无 cookie 会话的移动浏览器发出的请求，则在路径中使用波形符（"\~"）可能会导致无意中创建新会话，并可能会丢失会话数据。For mobile Web pages only, if your application relies on cookieless sessions or might receive requests from mobile browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("\~") in a path can result in inadvertently creating a new session and potentially losing session data. 若要设置具有路径（如 "\~/*path"*）的属性，请在将该 与参数（如 "\~/*路径"* ）一起分配给属性之前，通过调用来解析路径。To set a property with a path such as "\~/*path"*, resolve the path by calling the with an argument such as "\~/*path"* before assigning it to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 Web 服务器控件对象，并使用 方法设置图像的路径，该路径由 属性存储。The following example creates an Web server control object and uses the method to set the path to the image, which is stored by the property. [!code-csharp[Control_ResolveUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_ResolveUrl/CS/control_resolveurl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_ResolveUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_ResolveUrl/VB/control_resolveurl.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的状态，则此方法返回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可保存特定控件操作所需的状态信息。Use the method to save state information required for the operation of a specific control. 此控件状态数据与控件的视图状态数据分开存储。This control-state data is stored separately from the control's view-state data. 使用控件状态的自定义控件必须先对 调用 方法，然后才能保存控件状态。Custom controls using control state must call the method on the before saving control state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写自定义 ASP.NET 控件中的 方法。The following code example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET control. 调用此方法时，它将确定内部属性 `currentIndex` 是否设置为非默认值，如果是，则将该值保存到控件状态。When this method is invoked, it determines whether the internal property `currentIndex` is set to a non-default value and, if so, saves the value to control state. 重写 方法，以对 调用 方法，以指示自定义控件使用控件状态。The method is overridden to call the method on the to indicate that the custom control uses control state. [!code-csharp[ControlState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlState/CS/controlstatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[ControlState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlState/VB/controlstatevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 重写此方法以提取要在控件中使用的状态信息。

para.span: 控件状态适用于少量的关键数据，如页索引或关键字。

span.span: Control state is intended for small amounts of critical data, such as a page index or a keyword.

para.span: 对于大量数据，使用控件状态会对页性能产生不利影响。

span.span: Using control state for large amounts of data can adversely affect page performance.

para.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。

summary.span: 保存将页面回发到服务器之后发生的所有服务器控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 返回服务器控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the server control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是 类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页生命周期概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178472(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178472(v=vs.100)). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为存储在 HTML `HIDDEN` 元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `HIDDEN` element. 使用自定义视图状态创作自定义服务器控件时，可以使用 和 方法显式管理视图状态。When you author a custom server control with a custom view state, the view state can be managed explicitly with the and methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 有关实现自定义会话状态提供程序的信息，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178587(v=vs.100))。For information on implementing a custom session-state provider, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178587(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例重写自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的 方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 调用此方法时，它将确定控件是否有任何子控件，以及包含的 对象是否为回发的结果。When this method is invoked, it determines whether the control has any child controls and whether the containing object is the result of a postback. 如果两者都为 true，则它会更改 Web 服务器控件的 属性，以读取 `Custom Control Has Saved State`。If both are true, it changes the property of a Web server control to read `Custom Control Has Saved State`. 然后，它将控件的视图状态另存为一个名为 `allStates`的对象数组。It then saves the view state of the control as an array of objects, named `allStates`. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_state.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_state.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的可用外观包含在主题目录中的一个或多个外观文件中。Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory. 属性指定要应用于控件的外观。The property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control. 外观特定于特定控件;不能在不同类型的控件之间共享外观设置。A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin settings between controls of different types. 如果未设置 属性，控件将使用默认的外观（如果已定义）。If you do not set the property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined. 例如，如果为 控件定义了没有 ID 的外观，则该外观适用于所有未按 ID 显式引用外观且未设置为禁用主题的 控件。For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to all controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable themes. 如果为 控件定义了具有 ID 的外观，则该外观仅适用于其 属性设置为该 ID 的 控件。If a skin with an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies only to controls whose property is set to that ID. 如果主题目录中的外观文件不包含具有指定 属性的外观，则在运行时将引发 异常。If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified property, an exception is thrown at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定包含当前控件的页面或用户控件的路径。The property specifies the path to the page or user control that contains the current control. 例如，如果网页位于 `http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory`，则 属性返回 "application/子目录"。For example, if the Web page resides at `http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory`, the property returns "application/subdirectory". 若要返回应用程序相对虚拟路径（"~/subdirectory"），请使用 属性。To return the application-relative virtual path ("~/subdirectory"), use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例使用两次 属性。The following example uses the property twice. 第一次在 方法调用中使用它来获取控件所在目录的路径。The first time it is used in a method call to obtain the path to the directory in which the control resides. 第二次在 方法调用中，获取该目录中包含的所有文件的列表。The second time it is in a method call to obtain the list of all the files contained within that directory. summary.span: 导致跟踪服务器控件的视图状态的更改，以便这些更改可以存储到服务器控件的 对象中。

span.span: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object.

summary.span: 通过 属性可访问此对象。

span.span: This object is accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服务器控件生命周期的 事件结束时，将自动调用此方法。This method is called automatically at the end of the event in the server control's lifecycle. 在开发模板化数据绑定控件时调用此方法。Invoke this method when you develop templated data-bound controls. 此方法警报 ASP.NET 监视对服务器控件的视图状态所做的更改，这在重写 方法时是必需的。This method alerts ASP.NET to monitor changes to a server control's view state, which is required when you override the method. ## Examples 下面的示例重写自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的 方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 首先，将调用基 方法，然后使用 方法删除所有子控件，并使用 方法删除这些子控件的任何已保存的视图状态设置。It begins by calling the base method and then uses the method to delete all the child controls and the method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls. 最后， 属性设置为 `true`。Finally, the property is set to `true`. 然后，控件使用 属性来确定是否为控件启用了视图状态更改跟踪。The control then uses the property to determine whether view-state change tracking is enabled for the control. 如果未启用，则调用 方法。If it is not enabled, the method is called. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_state.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_state.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取服务器控件的唯一的、以分层形式限定的标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique, hierarchically qualified identifier for the server control.

value.span: 服务器控件的完全限定标识符。

span.span: The fully qualified identifier for the server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 属性不同，因为 属性包括服务器控件的命名容器的标识符。This property differs from the property, in that the property includes the identifier for the server control's naming container. 当处理页面请求时，将自动生成此标识符。This identifier is generated automatically when a page request is processed. 此属性在区分包含在重复的数据绑定服务器控件中的服务器控件时尤为重要。This property is particularly important in differentiating server controls contained within a data-binding server control that repeats. 重复控件（、、、和 Web 服务器控件（或创建的任何自定义服务器控件，这些控件在绑定数据时包含重复功能）作为其子控件的命名容器。The repeating control, which are , , , , and Web server controls (or any custom server controls that you create that include repeating functionality when data bound), serves as the naming container for its child controls. 这意味着，它为其子控件创建唯一的命名空间，使其 属性值不会发生冲突。This means that it creates a unique namespace for its child controls so that their property values do not conflict. 例如，如果在 服务器控件中包含 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件，并将 控件的 属性值指定为 `MyLabel`，则 `MyRepeater`。For example, if you include an ASP.NET Web server control in a server control, and assign the control an property value of `MyLabel`, and the an of `MyRepeater`. 如果将 数据绑定到包含三个条目的 对象，则 服务器控件的每个实例的生成 属性都是 `MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`、`MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`和 `MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`。If you bind data to the to an object with three entries, the resulting properties for each instance of the server controls are `MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`, `MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`, and `MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象并使用三个文本字符串填充该对象，然后在加载该页面时将 Web 服务器控件绑定到 中的数据。The following example creates an object and populates it with three text strings, then binds a Web server control to the data in the when the page is loaded. 此代码获取在数据绑定过程中生成的每个子控件的 属性。The code gets the property for each child control generated during data binding. 此代码将生成 控件的三个版本，并将其 `UniqueID` 属性值写入页面。The code generates three versions of the control and writes their `UniqueID` property values to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts/CS/WebFormsControlIdResolution12.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts/VB/WebFormsControlIdResolution12.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原服务器控件的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a server control across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 包含服务器控件视图状态信息的 类的实例。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the server control's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 为了跨 HTTP 请求保留这些值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性（ 类的实例）来存储属性值。In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 然后，在处理后续请求时，这些值将作为变量传递给 HTML 隐藏输入元素。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed. 有关保存服务器控件视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 默认情况下，将为所有服务器控件启用视图状态，但在某些情况下，你将需要禁用该状态。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances in which you will want to disable it. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668225(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668225(v=vs.100)). 有关字典以及如何使用它们的信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](/dotnet/standard/collections/)。For information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](/dotnet/standard/collections/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现一个 `Text` 属性，该属性从其控件的 属性存储和检索其值。The following example demonstrates implementing a `Text` property that stores and retrieves its value from its control's property. [!code-csharp[SysWebUIControlViewState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/CS/controlviewstate.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SysWebUIControlViewState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/VB/controlviewstate.vb#2)]

span.span: ASP.NET State Management Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果创建的自定义服务器控件在不考虑大小写的情况下保存其视图状态，请重写此方法。Override this method if you create a custom server control that saves its view state without taking case into account. 当你这样做时，多个具有相同键但大小写不同的对象可以存储在与 属性关联的 中。When you do so multiple objects with the same key, but with different casing, can be stored in the associated with the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写 属性以返回 `true`。The following example demonstrates how to override the property to return `true`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使为页禁用了视图状态，也可以使用 属性启用单个控件的视图状态。You can use the property to enable view state for an individual control even if view state is disabled for the page. 有关视图状态和控件状态的详细信息，请参阅 属性。For more information about view state and control state, see the property. 若要禁用页的视图状态并为该页上的特定控件启用视图状态，请将页和控件的 属性设置为 "`true`，将该页面的 属性设置为 ，并将该控件的 属性设置为 。To disable view state for a page and to enable it for a specific control on the page, set the property of the page and the control to `true`, set the property of the page to , and set the property of the control to . 页面的 属性的默认值为 ""。The default value of the property for a page is . 页面中 Web 服务器控件的 属性的默认值为 ""。The default value of the property for a Web server control in a page is . 因此，如果不在页面或控件级别设置此属性，则 属性的值将确定视图状态行为。As a result, if you do not set this property at either the page or the control level, the value of the property determines view-state behavior. 仅当 属性设置为 `true`时，页面或控件的 属性才有效果。The property of a page or a control has an effect only if the property is set to `true`. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则即使 属性设置为 ，也会关闭视图状态。If the property is set to `false`, view state will be turned off even if the property is set to .

value.span: 如果控件在页上可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is visible on the page; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `false`此属性，则不会呈现服务器控件。If this property is `false`, the server control is not rendered. 组织页面布局时，应考虑到这一点。You should take this into account when organizing the layout of your page. > [!NOTE] > 如果未呈现容器控件，则即使将单个控件的 属性设置为 `true`，也不会呈现它包含的任何控件。If a container control is not rendered, any controls that it contains will not be rendered even if you set the property of an individual control to `true`. 在这种情况下，即使已将 属性显式设置为 `true`，单独控件也会返回 `false`。In that case, the individual control returns `false` for the property even if you have explicitly set it to `true`. （也就是说，如果父控件的 `Visible` 属性设置为 `false`，则子控件将继承该设置，该设置优先于任何本地设置。）(That is, if the `Visible` property of the parent control is set to `false`, the child control inherits that setting and the setting takes precedence over any local setting.)
